Meta-Twitter Friends Global Summit 1

London Heathrow area

Friday 17th April (4pm) - Monday 20th April 2020 (12 noon)

A weekend cabin retreat to hang out with Twitter friends IRL.

This a private invite to join, please do not share this page.

Venue

A youth hostel building in the countryside, hired for our group's exclusive use

18 bunks, 4 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen, diner/lounge, 2 bathrooms & outside space

30mins by train from Central London / 20 mins by car from London Heathrow airport
